bibl.title: Report on the 2010 Season of Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab, Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project, January 9th-28th 2010. - A. Excavations in B/3/1. - B. The Wall Paintings. - C. Note on the Greek Graffito in Room 7. The graffito refers to a letter of the prostasia. II/III century CE. - D. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A., Daniel JONES, Luke FALVEY, Johanna PETKOV, Helen WHITEHOUSE and Klaas WORP, Report on the 2010 Season of Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab, Dakhleh Oasis.

Dakhleh Oasis Project, January 9th-28th 2010. - A. Excavations in B/3/1. - B. The Wall Paintings. - C. Note on the Greek Graffito in Room 7. The graffito refers to a letter of the prostasia. II/III century CE. - D. Conclusions.
Hope Jones Falvey Petkov Whitehouse Worp
